name: Tiny Pig
description:
Want to be a MONEY TYCOON? Can you TAP FAST enough? RESEARCH - TAP - RESEARCH - CLONE and tap away - even when you're not playing!

8 REASONS TO PLAY TINY PIG TYCOONS!

- SUPER DOPE GAMEPLAY! Just keep tapping the screen. The perfect idle clicker tycoon game, without every feeling bored! Hog is the greatest invention of God!

- TAP, RESEARCH & UPGRADE! Upgrade your town, make money, do researches and feel rich! Tap! Tap! Tapped!

- CLICK & CASH! Casual & addictive gameplay for aspiring capitalist who love to click & make Money. Slingshot in to a new episode of hog tycoons!

- ADD SWAG TO YOUR COUNTRY’s ECONOMY! Not everything is about Profit! Can your pigs reshape the economy of your country? Take prestige in raiding other economies and be the ultimate piggy tycoon.

- UNIQUE VISUALS! Tons of Hogs and barns in your town with a PET DOG to keep them company, silly eagles to hunt and carrier storks to steal from with amazing 3D visuals and captivating scenery.

- BE A BONUS BUFF! Lots of bonuses with every prestige, will keep you coming back for more, fulfil your consumers’ appetite for sausages to be the biggest Capitalist of this era.

- QUIRKY ECONOMY! Take full advantage of this enigmatic economy by clicking on your quirky tiny pigs to make more and more money

- PRESTIGE! Use your swag to sell your hog for more money by gaining more prestige in this quirky clicker game

You have the greatest invention of this era – your own cloning machine - Tap like a tycoon and make as many Tiny Pigs as you can to grow and upgrade your town to make MONEY in this awesome 3D game! Make sausage not war. Pay the quantum of compensation due to steer away from any trouble!
Expansion is the goal. Make sausage not war.

Lay back and enjoy your story to world rescue in this idle clicker game with an amazing & addictive game-play.
